# Government Tender Announcement
## Construction - Renovation at Butternut Farm, Rouge National Urban Park
### Solicitation No.: 5P468-22-0204/A
### Tender Closing Date and Time: January 12, 2023, 14:00:00

Parks Canada is soliciting bids for the construction renovation project at Butternut Farm in the Rouge National Urban Park. The objective of this project is to create a flexible space for park housing at the properties 7501 Steeles Ave, Markham, Ontario.

### Tender Description

This request for proposal is open to qualified and experienced General Contractors. The required services include construction renovation of a flexible space to house park employees. The project is estimated at a value between $500,001 to $1,000,000, and the successful bidder is required to provide proof of bonding and insurance.

### Mandatory Requirements

Bids must be submitted through the Government of Canada's Electronic Tendering Service (CANADABUYS) by the closing date stated above. Fax and email submissions will be accepted as official. However, bidders are advised that Parks Canada is not accepting bids via SAP Ariba at this time.

All correspondence regarding this solicitation should be sent to soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca.

### Additional Information

The successful bidder is expected to complete the project by June 01, 2023, at the latest. Two-site visits are mandatory, and successful bidders must participate in a 90-minute session on December 22, 2022, at 10:00 am EST. Those who do not confirm their attendance or do not send a representative will be refused access to the site.

Bidders should consult the Special Instructions to Bidders (SI 04) document for detailed requirements and evaluation criteria.

### Important Notice

Parks Canada retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents must be submitted in English or French, and the successful bidder must comply with the National Parks Regulations. Late submissions will not be considered.

### How to Bid

Bidders must obtain the solicitation documents from the Government of Canada's Electronic Tendering Service at www.canadabuys.canada.ca. All addenda, when issued, will be available from the same source.

For more information, please contact:
